channel.title: CVE Feed for Ubuntu -- libvirt
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ubuntu -- libvirt

item.title: CVE-2020-15708|2024-08-04T13:22:30.657Z -- ubuntu -- libvirt
item.description: Ubuntu's packaging of libvirt in 20.04 LTS created a control socket with world read and write permissions. An attacker could use this to overwrite arbitrary files or execute arbitrary code.
